00007 class XmlGetSession extends Plugin implements IOuputPlugin {
00008 
00009     public function run(Response $oResponse) {
00010         $oXml = simplexml_load_string($oResponse->getBody());
00011         if (!empty($oXml)) {
00012             $this->setVar('SessionId', $oXml->SessionId);
00013         } else {
00014             throw new PluginException('Unable to load XML');
00015         }
00016         return $oResponse;
00017     }
